title: Hornet Tire Bias Tractor Tire Repair Patch HTP1 - Single Patch (9" x 9" 4 Ply)
features: The HTP1 is the perfect patch for bias ply agriculture service tires. (9"x9" 4 Ply)
High strength, flexible and shock absorbing 4 ply construction
Constructed with a special rubber compound and nylon fibers.
Single Patch - Intended for trained professional installation only.
Buffing solution, cleaner, cement, liner sealer and other tools are not included.
NOT FOR USE IN RADIAL TIRES
description: The Hornet Tire HTP line is a high flexibility bias agricultural tire repair patch, designed to flex in high torque applications where pressures vary, due to load and soil conditions.
